question: Pipe A can fill an empty tank in 6 hours and pipe B in 8 hours. If both the pipes are opened and after 2 hours pipe A is closed, how much time B will take to fill the remaining tank?
explanation:
Part of the tank filled by pipe A and B in 2 hours
$latex = 2\\left ( \\frac{1}{6}+\\frac{1}{8} \\right )&s=1$
$latex = 2\\left ( \\frac{4+3}{24} \\right ) = \\frac{7}{12}&s=1$
Remaining part $latex = 1-\\frac{7}{12} = \\frac{5}{12}&s=1$
This part is filled by pipe B. 
âˆ´ Required Time $latex = \\frac{5}{12}\\times 8 = \\frac{10}{3} = 3\\frac{1}{3}\\ hours&s=1$
Hence option [B] is correct answer.
